text: The Story of Nampoo () is a 1984 Thai drama movie directed by Euthana Mukdasanit and based on the novel of the same name (known in Thai as ) by Suwanni Sukhontha. It stars Rewat Buddhinan, Amphol Lumpoon, Patravadi Sritrairat. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 drama movies Category:Thai movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Euthana Mukdasanit
title: The Story of Nampoo
